text: Free cash deposits across all Ujjivan SFB bank branches up to 10 times of the previous month s average balance or `3 lakhs whichever is higher.
100 "at par" cheque leaves free per quarter
Free Electronic Fund Transfer NEFT, RTGS, IMPS. Remit money anywhere anytime across India free of cost.
Point of Sales Solutions (POS) - Stand-alone POS terminals / Wireless POS Terminals GP terminals (Offered through third party tie ups).
Enjoy the benefits of Rupay Classic debit card with Unlimited free ATM transactions at Ujjivan ATM and 10 free transactions at other bank ATM.
Enhanced limits: `1,00,000 per day in ATM and Shopping.
50 Free Cash withdrawal at Ujjivan Branch every month.
Transaction alerts for updates on your account as and when transactions happen. No need to visit a branch or ATM.
Non-cash services (DD and PO transactions at nominal cost).
Need for maintenance of Monthly average balance of `10,000 per month
Non-maintenance of the minimum balance entails a fee of `200+ GST per month.
